name: Graciel's Guide to Human Love
description:
Graciel's Guide to Human Love is a small and fun complement of the Fertiliel Universe.  It's not, however, a demo of Fertiliel - Cupid Simulator game (currently under development).

The angel Fertiliel has been assigned the role of Cupid, but finds it difficult to understand human relationships. Thankfully, her friend Graciel is a human expert and can explain how human relationships work!

If you like these characters, please join our community to get the latest news on Fertiliel - Cupid Simulator :)

          

Thanks for playing this experience and hope you like it! Also, please share any feedback in how we could improve it! 😊
A big hug from everybody at Supernova Games.
